directions: Combine ice, vodka, schnapps, pomegranate juice, simple syrup, and lemon juice in shaker. Shake vigorously to chill.  Pour into martini glass, top with a splash of chilled lemon-lime soda, and garnish glass with a slice of fresh lime.
ingredients: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger vanilla flavored vodka
title: Pomegranate Martini
